title: Condensed serif font Henry S. Miller
content:
Need quick ID for this, thanks!

author: pattyfab

comments.content: **[Abraham Lincoln](http://web.archive.org/web/20150313022557/http:/www.losttype.com/font/?name=Abraham+Lincoln)** by Frances MacLeod [2011, LostType], probably a bit emboldened?
Wow that was fast, thank you!
